IDENTIFICATION_FAILED.ERROR_MESSAGE:
There are various reasons for which an ID verification can go wrong - here are some tips that might help next time:
• fast internet connection
• well-lit room
• ID/passport in good condition.

There is a 20% higher chance of successfully verifying your ID on the second attempt if there are no document-related issues.

GOTO_APP.START: You are now ready to start investing

There you will find all of our current and upcoming investment opportunities.
You can also use the chat function to schedule a call with one of our representatives or let us know how can we best help you achieve your investing goals.
